note:
Let's play a game. Introducing 'On Lock' - the first musical, lock-to-auction NFT collection on Bitcoin. Cost? Free. Levels? High. GMI? Yes. 

Artwork: https://ordinals.gorillapool.io/content/4d04dd9c960ddf31bdf1d4b2c073be36bc7cb7fc4901d3f1db98ab0266adea8d_0 

Featuring original music from yours truly, this 21 NFT collection is a celebration of the discovery of locking on Bitcoin. Each edition features the 'On Lock' song, and 1/1 unique visuals. 20 pieces are up for grabs.

There are two ways to get a piece. 

Lock-bids [the "locktion"]:
1) lock some Bitcoin against THIS POST for 25,000 blocks or more. Only locks to THIS POST (not the comments) are valid bids.
2) drop your 1satordinals address in the comments. 
3) the 20 highest lock-bidders by MONDAY 29th JANUARY, 6pm UTC are the winners. They will be sent their NFT to the provided 1satordinals address.
4) you can bid as many times as you need to.  

Fading and FOMOing in on secondary:
1) ngmi 

Let the games begin.

note:
The more ambitious narrative wins. 
We must insist we in BSV are the meta-political counter movement to everything WEF wants to do to us. BTC thinks small, as it’s limited to a money alternative narrative.
This is a script flip: the last 4 years on Twitter the presentation has been that BSV is the small narrative about efficient payments, and BTC is the big meta-narrative about money.
